message.body: Hello! Did you decide to hop on another boat for a cruise? Hahahah.
Hahaha. I did not no... Been real busy with week with hotel budgets though. How are you?
I'm good :) trying to get myself organized and up to date. At it's almost Friday right? Any plans?
It is... Nothing really... Still focusing on this work first. Probably just relax this weekend.
Yea it sounds pretty stressful. Are you working on the budgets by yourself?
Well the budgets are completed by the hotel management. I have to review and approve or ask them to make changes.
Hmm would you happen to be heading down to Chester tonight?
No!!! I'm actually going to be near Sugarhouse in Fishtown.
Oh nice! Big party?
Dinner with Nova friends. We're going to PYT and I've been wanting to try that place for a while! Are you heading to Harrah's?
I like PYT. Some of their stuff are good. I might. Was thinking about it. Lol
Any recommendations???
What's the occasion?
I like the buffalo blue. No occasion, was just planning.
Gotcha. Aw we should plan a night to get dinner!
We should! It's been a while.
I know! We still have to go get burgers at Perch Pub!
Where is that at?
On Broad. Right down from City Hall and across the street from The Bellevue,
Right right. I remember now.
